oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ al-Lubāb fī ʻilm al-iʻrāb : manuscript, 1365
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shīrāzī, Muḥammad ibn Masʻūd ibn Muḥammad , active 1312
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Title from inside cover in a later handscript.
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red. Notes and additions in the margins.
Laid paper. 19.2 x 13.6 cm. (15.3 x 11 cm.).
According to the colophon (f. 186r), copy completed on 26 Ramaḍān 766 AH [June 16, 1365 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad.
Bound in blind stamped brown leather.
MS Arab 212. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
